attributes.action: Agree to agree to  re-instate the legalisation of "old poppers - amyl nitrate" as the new version burns your nose the old version is ok and had no health defects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new version of poppers that is now legal is dangerous to skin 

the new version of poppers burns the old version of poppers (amyl nitrate or arkil nitrate) did not burn unless you used it in abusivley 

the government needs to licence the old forumula of poppers as most gay men use this product for sexual activities 

please please gordon brown re-instate "old poppers" as a legal  substance as poppers has been used in the uk without any probems for the past 50 years

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
